alert.note: Alert for Jemez Mountains; Southwest Mountains; Tusas Mountains Including Chama (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 8:02PM MST until January 02 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 6 and 10 inches with locally higher amounts above 10,000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph may create areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Jemez Mountains, Tusas Mountains Including Chama, and Southwest Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire traction will be reduced. Consider making alternate travel plans or delaying travel.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Jemez Mountains; Southwest Mountains; Tusas Mountains Including Chama
